channel.title: This Birding Life/Bird Watcher's Digest
channel.description: This Birding Life is a podcast from the folks at Bird Watcher's Digest. And like the magazine's content, the topics covered by This Birding Life range far and wide -- from the backyard to the tropics, from bird feeding to bird chasing, from authors reading from their books to birders talking about their "spark" bird. This Birding Life is guaranteed to make you think, laugh, and want to spend more time out there with the birds. It's all about this wonderful hobby we share: watching and enjoying wild birds. Welcome to This Birding Life!
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast for Bird Watchers Everywhere!
channel.itunes:author: Bird Watcher's Digest
channel.itunes:summary: This Birding Life is a podcast from the folks at Bird Watcher's Digest. And like the magazine's content, the topics covered by This Birding Life range far and wide -- from the backyard to the tropics, from bird feeding to bird chasing, from authors reading from their books to birders talking about their "spark" bird. This Birding Life is guaranteed to make you think, laugh, and want to spend more time out there with the birds. It's all about this wonderful hobby we share: watching and enjoying wild birds. Welcome to This Birding Life! Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Music Store.

item.title: Episode 1: Letters from Eden, Julie Zickefoose
item.description: Artist, author, and naturalist Julie Zickefoose reads January Thaw, one of her winter essays from her new book, Letters from Eden.
item.itunes:keywords: Zickefoose, Letters from Eden, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 2: Birding Technology, Part I
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews naturalist Jeff Gordon at Bird Watch America.
item.itunes:keywords: Bird Watch America, BWA, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 3: Birding Technology, Part II
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews naturalist Jeff Gordon, discussing technical trends in bird watching.
item.itunes:keywords: Bird Watch America, BWA, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 4: Return to Wild America by Scott Weidensaul
item.description: Author and naturalist Scott Weidensaul reads an excerpt from his book, Return to Wild America.
item.itunes:keywords: Scott Weidensaul, Return to Wild America, Roger Tory Peterson, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 5: Interview with Scott Weidensaul
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews Scott Weidensaul.
item.itunes:keywords: Scott Weidensaul, Return to Wild America, Roger Tory Peterson, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 6: The Perils and Pitfalls of Birding
item.description: Recorded from his live presentation at the Space Coast Birding Festival, Bill Thompson, III, reveals the humorous side of bird watching.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Space Coast Birding Festival, Florida, bird, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 7: A Postcard from Tikal
item.description: Visiting Guatemala and the ancient Mayan city of Tikal, Host Bill Thompson, III, Julie Zickefoose, and Jeff Gordon discuss tropical birding and the birds of Tikal from the top of a Mayan temple.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Guatemala, Tikal, Julie Zickefoose, Jeff Gordon, tropical, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 8: A Five Hawk Experience
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, interviews bird artist Keith Hansen, who describes a mind-blowing hawk encounter outside of his Bolinas, California art studio.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Keith Hansen, hawk, bird watching, birding

item.title: Episode 9: A Conversation with Kenn Kaufman
item.description: Birding all-star Kenn Kaufman talks about his life with birds, his early days as a bird watcher, his latest field guides, the great Roger Tory Peterson, and the future of birding.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Kenn Kaufman, Roger Tory Peterson, birding

item.title: Episode 10: A Conversation with Lang Elliott
item.description: Lang Elliott, the mighty maven of bird sound in North America, talks about his inspiration and renowned work in recording nature sounds.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Lang Elliott, bird song, birding, insect

item.title: Episode 11: Adventure on Rapa Nui
item.description: Tropical birding expert Alvaro Jaramillo took a side trip to Rapa Nui (Easter Island), which became one of the best experiences of his birding life.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Alvaro Jaramillo, Rapa Nui, Easter Island, bird song, birding

item.title: Episode 12: Paradise Lost
item.description: Artist, author, and naturalist Julie Zickefoose reads Paradise Lost, an essay from her latest book, Letters from Eden.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Julie Zickefoose, Letters from Eden, Paradise Lost, naturalist, artist, birding

item.title: Episode 13: The Singing Life of Birds
item.description: Author Donald Kroodsma discusses the art and science behind listening to bird songs.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Donald Kroodsma, The Singing Life of Birds, song, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 14: birdJam: a Revolution in Bird Identification
item.description: Bill Thompson, III talks with birdJam cofounders Jay Davis and Denese VanDyne about the origins and potential of birdJam.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, birdJam, Jay Davis, Denese VanDyne, iPod, bird identification, bird song, bird calls, song, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 15: Birding the World With Victor Emanuel
item.description: Bill Thompson, III talks with Victor Emanuel and discusses his inspiration for creating a worldwide birding and nature tour company.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Victor Emanuel, Victor Emanuel Nature Tours, VENT, tourism, touring, nature, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 16: Capsized by Rogue Wave
item.description: Lisa White from Houghton Mifflin Harcourt reads an excerpt from All Things Reconsidered, by Roger Tory Peterson and edited by Bill Thompson, III.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Rogery Tory Peterson, All Things Reconsidered, nature, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 17: Adventures in Birding With Bryan Bland
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, asks birding tour leader Bryan Bland to recount his memorable travels to India and beyond.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Sunbird Tours, Bryan Bland, tourism, nature, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 18: Phoebe and The Young Birder's Guide
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews Phoebe Linnea Thompson, his daughter and co-author on The Young Birder's Guide to Birds of Eastern North America.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Young Birder's Guide, young birder, children, kids, nature, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 19: Love and Death Among the Cranes
item.description: Julie Zickefoose reads her controversial column, "Love and Death Among the Cranes."
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Julie Zickefoose, Bird Watcher's Digest, nature, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 20: iBird and the Evolution of the Digital Field Guide
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, talks with Mitchell Waite about iBird and the future of digital field guides in general.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, iBird, Mitchell Waite, Bird Watcher's Digest, iPhone, iPod, iPhone app, field guide, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 21: Saving the Cebu Flowerpecker
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, talks with Lisa Marie Paguntalan about saving one of the rarest birds in the world.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, iBird, Cebu, Flowerpecker, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird conservation, Cebu Biodiversity Conservation Foundation, woodpecker, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 22: Snippets From a Life Gone to the Birds
item.description: Humorist Al Batt recounts his experiences with all aspects of the natural world at the 2009 Midwest Birding Symposium in Lakeside, Ohio.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, iBird, Midwest Birding Symposium, Al Batt, Bird Watcher's Digest, humor, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 23: The Big Sit!
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, interviews participants in the 2008 Big Sit! held in the birding tower on his farm, Indigo Hill, in southeastern Ohio.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, iBird, The Big Sit!, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 24: Birding in Panama
item.description: During an eight-day birding trip to Panama, Host Bill Thompson, III interviews traveling companions for experiences and impressions.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Panama, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 25: An Englishman in Florida
item.description: English birder Bo Beolens, the Fatbirder, recounts his first birding trip to Florida.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Fatbirder, Bo Beolens, Flordia, English, England, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 26: Voices of Guyana
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, journeys to Guyana and interviews Amerindian guides, ecotourism visionaries, international travel experts, and government officials about this world-class birding destination.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Guyana, travel, South America, international travel, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 27: Music and Birds: Jonathan Meiberg of Shearwater
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, interviews Jonathan Meiberg, a birder and leader of the indie-rock band Shearwater.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Jonathan Meiberg, Shearwater, music, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 28: The Bird Call Lady
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, talks with Nicole Perretta a.k.a The Bird Call Lady about her ability to imitate the songs and calls of more than 130 species of birds.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Nicole Perretta, music, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 29: Nature in Iraq
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, interviews an Iraqi civil engineer and an American soldier about their shared interest in observing and restoring nature in the war-torn country of Iraq.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Iraq war, nature, Middle East, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 30: Sophie Webb: Life at Sea
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews Sophie Webb, an ornithologist/artist/author from California who spends much of each year at sea aboard an oceanic research vessel.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Sophie Webb, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 31: An Interview with Michael Male
item.description: Bill Thompson, III, interviews Michael Male, one of the world's leading nature videographers.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Michael Male, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 32: Trekking for the Philippine Eagle
item.description: BWD editor Bill Thompson, III, reads his account of a trek to see the Philippine Eagle on the island of Mindanao in the Philippines.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Philippines, Philippine Eagle, travel, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 33: An Interview with David Frankel
item.description: In this episode, TBL host Bill Thompson, III, interviews David Frankel, director of the movie "The Big Year."
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, The Big Year, David Frankel, movie, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 34: The Birding Life of Greg Miller
item.description: Greg Miller, an Ohio birder who served as inspiration for one of the characters in "The Big Year", tell the story of his own birding life.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, The Big Year, Greg Miller, movie, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 35: The Snowy Owl Invasion
item.description: TBL host Bill Thompson, III, and some birding companions take a trip to see a snowy owl and they get much more than they bargained for!
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, snowy owl, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 36: The Sounds of Spring at Indigo Hill
item.description: TBL host Bill Thompson, III, shares recordings of bird calls heralding the arrival of spring on Indigo Hill.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, bird, birding

item.title: Episode 37: Birding the Hula Valley of Israel
item.description: Host Bill Thompson, III, talks with three of Israel's leading bird authorities about why this Mideast country is such a mecca for birds and for birders.
item.itunes:keywords: Bill Thompson, Bird Watcher's Digest, Israel, bird, birding
